metaDescription.description: Writes CAS data in XMI format into a relational (PostgreSQL) database. It is possible to write the whole XMI for each document into the database. However, it is also possible to define a list of annotations that should be written into separate tables. The JCoRe XMI Database Reader can then be used to assemble XMI data from a given set of annotations.
metaDescription.name: JCoRe XMI Database Writer

metaDescription.description: This is a JeDIS component. It can be used to set the 'last component' column in a subset table. This help to keep track of the pipeline status.
metaDescription.name: JCoRe Database Checkpoint AE

uimaDescPath: XMI Database Writer for BANNER Genes.xml
